file_content.text: You're too late. The detonite charges are in place. Even you won't be able to stop them all in time!
You're too late. My teams are already placing the detonite charges. You'll never stop them all!
The power of the light side is stronger than you think. You'd know that if you could feel the Force.
The Force is with me.
All your tricks and distractions can't stop me, Krannus. I'm ending this!
You underestimated my power.
You surprise me. I thought for certain you would stop to help Doctor Gantrell.
There's nowhere left to run. I'm putting an end to your madness.
I finally caught you.
I couldn't give you time to complete the Emperor's mission. You're finished, Krannus.
Many other lives were at risk.
You've tried everything to keep me from catching you, but it didn't work. You're done, Krannus.
Enough of your tricks.
We're all going to die here. The difference is, I'll live again.
Imperials! Surrender to this Jedi Knight immediately! Drop your weapons!
Republic special forces. Sorry to show up late.
Better late than never.
Glad you could make it.
It's over, Krannus. Don't be a fool. Surrender.
I thought my mission was top secret. Where did you come from?
How did you know about me?
I'll explain after this scum surrenders.
The enemy is on a suicide mission. Take them out!
Open fire on the Imperials!
For the Emperor's glory! Die and be reborn!
You've already gained access to the maximum security wing. Impressive.
I didn't expect my men to kill you, but I was hoping they'd slow you down.
I'm not going to stop, Krannus. Sooner or later, I'll catch you.
You can't run forever.
You're never going to reach the Rakata power core, Krannus.
I know about your plan.
Your pathetic followers never stood a chance. Neither will you.
They were weak.
The Force is a powerful ally, but I have my own resources--and more than one plan to destroy this world.
My commandos are planting explosives along the volcanic rift. The detonation will trigger cataclysmic eruptions. Geysers of molten lava will kill millions--including you.
This distraction might buy you time, but you're still going to fail.
I'll stop them... and you.
We'll see.
Why would you tell me this and give me a chance to prevent it?
This is some kind of trick.
I intend to give the Emperor a much greater gift than the lives on Belsavis. Destroying the volcanic rifts is merely insurance.
All these little traps are spreading your forces too thin. You won't have anyone left when I finally catch up with you.
You're getting desperate.
If all goes as planned, that meeting will never happen.
So this is just a distraction.
One you cannot afford to ignore. Not unless you want the Emperor to win.
If you're going to stop my commandos, I suggest you hurry. I'll press on without you. I'm sure you understand.
Let's get this up and running again.
Thank you for slaying Colonel Hareth. Her death at your hand has surely marked her as one of the chosen.
She will receive a place of honor when the Emperor grants us eternal life.
The Emperor will never complete his ritual. Not as long as I'm alive.
You're not going to win.
You've been brainwashed. The Emperor has filled your head with false promises so you'll throw your lives away for him.
The Emperor lied to you.
She's not coming back to life. That doesn't happen.
Dead is dead. End of story.
I may not feel the Force as you do, Jedi, but I know its power transcends death.
The spirits of ancient Sith linger in their tombs. Dead Jedi Masters guide their former Padawans. I've heard the tales. I know the truth.
This delay has cost you. Now, you cannot stop what is to come. The Emperor's will is inevitable.
Pak, come in. Executor Krannus isn't here. He's already gone deeper into the prison.
Maybe we can track him using the prison surveillance systems. Let me see what I can cook up.
Republic reinforcements are finally on their way to secure that generator.
Head back to my position. I'll start searching for Krannus.
